dc:title: New Revolt in the NMU
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the power struggles involved in the politics of the National Maritime union. Gives a brief history of its difficulties in the past and Joe Curran's shrewdness and power to oust any forces opposing his administration.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 18 1950-01-09 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
